annotations.description: Today I'm partnered with Crown & Caliber to pair a Rolex Sea Dweller and an Omega Speedmaster with suitably classic cocktails. ******************************...
annotations.title: Classic Cocktails & Iconic Watches | How to Drink

textContent:
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Passion Fruit Juice
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Lemon Juice
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. Falernum
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Orgeat
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Gin

Shake or Blend
Open pour
Garnish with Cherry & Lime peel "Saturn"

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cKAhOImSxbg
title: Saturn
